content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I was asked to browse the National Geographic website for the latest news on the environment. I used the command "browse_website" and found a collection of articles and videos related to the environment, covering topics such as air quality, climate change, marine reserves, foraging, and dust storms. It also includes a section on history and culture, as well as travel recommendations. One article highlights Japan's plan to release nuclear wastewater into the Pacific. I was then asked to use the "google" command to search for more information on this topic. The search returned multiple articles from various sources, including Science.org, National Geographic, and BBC, among others.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://www.nytimes.com/2022/12/30/world/asia/japan-fukushima-wastewater-pacific-radiation.html", "question": ""}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: Japan plans to release over 1.3 million tons of treated but still slightly radioactive water from the Fukushima Daiichi nuclear plant into the Pacific starting in spring 2023, due to a lack of storage space. The proposal has sparked outrage among Japan's neighbors, particularly those who have experienced unexpected exposure to dangerous levels of radiation.\n\nLinks: ['Skip to content (https://www.nytimes.com/2022/12/30/world/asia/japan-fukushima-wastewater-pacific-radiation.html#gateway-content)', 'Asia Pacific (https://www.nytimes.com/section/world/asia)', ' (https://www.nytimes.com/)', 'SUBSCRIBE FOR â‚¬0.50/WEEK (https://www.nytimes.com/subscription?campaignId=9YU8R)', 'Log in (https://myaccount.nytimes.com/auth/login?response_type=cookie&client_id=vi&redirect_uri=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.nytimes.com%2Fsubscription%2Fonboarding-offer%3FcampaignId%3D7JFJX%26EXIT_URI%3Dhttps%253A%252F%252Fwww.nytimes.com%252F2022%252F12%252F30%252Fworld%252Fasia%252Fjapan-fukushima-wastewater-pacific-radiation.html&asset=masthead)']", type='action_result')]
"""
